name: Amazon EFS
description: Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) provides scalable, parallel file storage for use with your AWS applications.  Imagine it as a shared file server that can grow and shrink automatically as your data storage needs change.

name: Amazon S3
description: Amazon S3, or Amazon Simple Storage Service, is a scalable and object storage service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS).

name: AWS DataSync
description: AWS DataSync is a managed data transfer service that simplifies moving large datasets between on-premises storage and AWS storage services. It automates and accelerates data transfers, eliminating the need for manual processes or complex scripting.
